item.title: New Gold Announces Senior Management Changes
item.description: [CNW Group] - New Gold Announces Senior Management Changes

item.title: New Gold Announces Senior Management Changes
item.description: [PR Newswire] - TORONTO, Dec. 19, 2016 /PRNewswire/ - New Gold Inc. ("New Gold") (NGD) (NYSE MKT:NGD) is pleased to announce that Hannes Portmann has been named President of New Gold. Randall Oliphant will continue in his role of Executive Chairman and Brian Penny will continue as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer. Mr. Portmann was originally with Western Goldfields Inc. ("Western Goldfields") from 2008 until its 2009 merger with New Gold.

item.title: New Gold Receives Approval for Construction of Rainy River Tailings Management Facility and Hedges Portion of 2017 Copper Production
item.description: [PR Newswire] - TORONTO, Nov. 15, 2016 /PRNewswire/ - New Gold Inc. ("New Gold") (NGD) (NYSE MKT:NGD) today announces that the company has received approval to commence construction of the tailings management facility at its Rainy River project, located in northwestern Ontario. Separately, New Gold has entered into hedges to lock in current copper prices for a portion of the company's first half 2017 copper production. As previously disclosed, during the course of the construction of the water management facility earlier in 2016, New Gold identified areas underlying both the water and tailings management facilities where the strength of the foundation is less than was estimated for the original designs.
